title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
OB: When a directory (project) is exported as a JAR file and the exported JAR is placed back in the same directory, overwriting it on the second attempt, an out of sync message is shown.
EB: The exported JAR file should not include itself to prevent the out of sync message.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Export a directory (project) as a JAR file.
2. Place the exported JAR in the same directory.
3. Overwrite the exported JAR file with the same JAR file.
